segments.text: Dad , may I have a room of my own ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , honey , I'm so sorry , we don't have enough space for you to have your own room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dad , but I don't want to share a room with Peter . He snores every night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , you can ask him to be quite . Otherwise you may punish him and tell him to stand out of the room , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . Maybe it's the only way to do it .
segments.speaker: S1
